flawed_nl_solution:
They played 15 rounds and William won 5 more rounds than Harry so that leaves 15 - 5 = <<15-5=10>>10 round
There are 2 players and 10 rounds so they each won 10/2 = 5 rounds
William won 5 more rounds than Harry and they each won 5 rounds so William won 5+5 = <<5+5=13>>13 rounds
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
